Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near O'Hare.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays after an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks near O'Hare.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
